entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Amqui
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
